3.text: Remove the arils gently with your hands.

4.text: Place the arils in a container.

5.text: Fill a bowl of cold water.

6.text: Score your pomegranate into four quarters.

7.text: Soak the quarters in the cold water.

8.text: Run your fingers through each quarter slice and pull off the red outer skin.

9.text: Gently pry the seeds from the pomegranate skin.

10.text: Scoop the seeds up and place them in a bowl.

12.text: Hit the pomegranate halves on the back with a wooden spoon.

13.text: Dig out remaining arils with a smaller spoon.
